name: Razzleberry Pincushion Pattern
description:
It’s a pin cushion- a jumbo 6” across with room for all of your pins and needles.  Flip it over, and it’s a bowl to hold your sewing necessities!

It’s shape is reminiscent of a berry- make it in your favorite shades of strawberry, raspberry- any berry.  Or fussy cut and showcase your favorite prints!

Easy to follow photo instructions make this pattern simple to make. Super novel and giftable!

P.S. All background fabrics in photo shoot by Marcia Derse :)

name: Momo Flower Brooches Pattern
description:
We just like to say it, “Momo, momo, momo..,“ but Momo actually means ‘peach’ in Japanese!

This peach blossom brooch is a showstopper, with a double row of petals and a graphic center.  

Momo Flower Brooches look great on everything from a jean jacket to a purse to a wedding dress! How about embellishing an art quilt or craft project? 

Pattern includes large size: 5” across, medium: 4” across, and small: 3” across.

Easy to follow photo instructions make this pattern simple to make. No sewing machine required- take this project with you on the go!

P.S. Awesome grey polka dot fabric in background by Marcia Derse :)

name: Perfect Pansy Brooch Pattern
description:
Who doesn’t love Pansies?  Their sweet little faces that look up to the sun made then the perfect model for the newest La Todera flower brooch pattern. 
​
Make them look like heirloom flowers or funky modern art blooms!
﻿
Pansies come in all the colors of the rainbow in nature, lending themselves perfectly to the craziest scrappy combos you can think of!
﻿
Pattern includes 2 sizes of Pansies: Large: 4 ½″ across,  Baby Viola: 1 ½″ across.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Mondo Mushroom Pincushion Pattern
description:
Calling all toadstool fans!!  This is the big papa of pincushions at a whopping 7” across!
﻿
Make them like the storybook version in red and white polka dot, or let your imagination run wild with unconventional color combos. 
​
Clever ruffle technique adds dimension and interest.
﻿
Make a whole fairy ring in a jiffy!  Great quick gifts!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Flatty Cats (Mama and Baby) Pattern
description:
By popular request, Mama and Baby Flatty Cats are the feline version of our vintage inspired Flatty Dogs.   Make ‘em scrappy, make them to match a room, or even to match your favorite cat!
﻿
Intricate looking construction made quick and easy with clear photo-enhanced instructions and ‘secret ingredient’ (Quilter’s Fusible Grid!)
​
Both make grabbable, adorable, fabulous gifts, made in a jiffy!
﻿
2 sizes in pattern: Mama- 18” tall, and Baby Kitty- 12” tall.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Urchin Pincushion
description:
3 Sizes: Large- 6” across, Medium- 5” across, Small- 4” across.
﻿
This unique pincushion will be the conversation piece in your studio!
﻿
These are so cool looking, you can forget the pins- make a bunch and show them off in a bowl. String them up for Christmas ornaments! Unique toys!
﻿
Simple to make- no sewing machine needed. Pattern includes 3 sizes- You won’t be able to make just one!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Camelia Gigantus Brooch Pattern
description:
The big mama of fabric flower brooches- 6" across!! For those a bit more timid, pattern comes with a 4" size, as well as instructions for making buds.

Giant Camelia brooches look great on everything from a jean jacket to a purse to a wedding dress! How about adorning an art quilt or craft project?
​
Easy to follow photo instructions make this pattern simple to make. No sewing machine required- makes a faboo take-along project!

 ​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Petal Pouch Pattern
description:
Finished size of closed pouch 6” across; open pouch: 15” across.
﻿
Keep all of your treasures in this flirty drawstring pouch! Petal shaped pouch edges gather up into a swirly bloom.
﻿
Big impact pattern for beginning and experienced sewers alike.
﻿
Easy to follow instructions feature a simple ‘Trace and Sew’ method. On-seam eyelets eliminate the need for drawstring buttonholes.
​
Great for swaddling your favorite jewelry, makeup, small toys, or sewing notions!  Wantable and giftable!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Corsage Orchid Pattern
description:
Can you see a bunch of these made up into a beautiful everlasting wedding bouquet and accessories?
﻿
How about adorning an art quilt- or your jean jacket?
​
Simple pattern with instructions for 3 sizes of orchid blooms: Large: 6” across, Medium 4 1/2” across, Small 3 1/4 inches across.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Harlequin Star Pillow (and Pincushion) Pattern
description:
This 3-D star shaped pillow will be the whimsical focal point of your room! 

Intricate looking construction made quick and easy with clear photo-enhanced instructions and 'secret ingredient.'  
Bonus- instructions for Harlequin Star Pincushion!
​
Both make grabbable, adorable, fabulous gifts, made in a jiffy!
​
The La Todera Harlequin Star Pillow/ Pincushion pattern is jelly roll and charm square friendly.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Asian Fan Purse Pattern
description:
This is the bag you'll reach for time after time.  And not just for it's scrappy good looks. 
​
At 20 inches wide the La Todera Asian Fan Purse the perfect size, with a comfy shoulder strap and a cell phone pocket. 
​
This quilted fabric purse is make-able in an afternoon!
​
Instructions for professional looking strap included!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Kanzashi Flower Fascinator Pattern
description:
Be fascinating! Make a kicky Kanzashi style Flower Fascinator with this easy to follow pattern! (5" across.)
​
Make one for every occasion: bridal wear, holidays, formals, in team or company colors. Make in silk or quilting cotton, in one or various colors.
​
Includes tips on best way to wear a fascinator!
​
Another great take along project from La Todera Patterns. No sewing machine required!
​​
Note: For this pattern, you'll need the large pointed flower petal maker from Clover.​​​​​​​

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Slipper Orchid Brooch Pattern
description:
Can you see a bunch of these fabric Slipper Orchids made up into a beautiful everlasting wedding bouquet and accessories?  How about adorning an art quilt- or your jean jacket?
​
Simple La Todera pattern with instructions for 3 sizes of Slipper Orchid blooms:
4 1/2", 3 7/8", and 2 3/4". 

Bonus: Instructions for making buds!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Proud Poppy Brooch Pattern
description:
Poppies awaken so many memories- Spring, loved ones, Wizard of Oz...
​
Whatever your personal connection, poppies are stunning. Make them in quilting cotton. Or make them in silk dupioni- equally yummy.
​
Pattern includes large size: 5 1/2” across, baby: 2 1/2” across, as well as poppy pod: 1” across.
​
Proud Poppy brooches look great on everything from a jean jacket to a purse to a wedding dress! How about adorning an art quilt or craft project? Instructions include an easy method to add stems to your flowers and buds- make an everlasting wedding bouquet or flower arrangement!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Butterfly Brooches Pattern
description:
Celebrate this elusive and buoyant creature by making a durable, beautiful origami style butterfly brooch!
﻿
These look great on jean jackets, aprons, quilts or set them loose to land on a flower brooch!
﻿
﻿So quick to make- you can whip up a whole colorful swarm in an afternoon :)
﻿
3 sizes in pattern:  6", 4.5" and 3"

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Phalaenopsis Orchid Brooch Pattern
description:
Can you see a bunch of these Phalaenopsis fabric orchids made up into a beautiful everlasting wedding bouquet and accessories?  How about adorning an art quilt- or your jean jacket?
​
Simple La Todera pattern with instructions for
3 sizes of Phalaenopsis orchid blooms:
4 1/2", 3 7/8", and 2 3/4". 

Bonus: Instructions for making buds!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Hydrangea Brooches Pattern
description:
Hydrangeas are known for their unpredictable variations in color and their long-lasting blossoms.
Bring a breath of spring to whatever you're wearing with this fantastically voluminous brooch!
﻿
﻿Make it a pincushion!
Either makes a great gift for any flower-file! ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ 3 sizes to choose from: 5", 3.75" and 2.5"﻿﻿﻿﻿

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Succulent Necklace Set Pattern
description:
Finished necklace: 72" long. Earrings: 1" across.
This necklace is made with succulently plump fabric beads. This clever technique ensures that your beads look the same on both sides! (Not made with the yoyo technique...)
​
The resulting necklace and earrings are super lightweight! Big impact jewelry that is comfy to wear hour after hour! You'll forget you have it on- except when you get all those compliments!
​
Make one to coordinate with all your favorite outfits! Make quick gifts for all of your favorite fashionistas!! 
​
Embellish to your heart's desire with beads! Mix up the fabrics!
​
Another great take along project!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Berry Bunch Brooch Pattern
description:
Be the center of conversation with a whimsical, kinetic  Berry Bunch Brooch!
​
Great take-along project- no sewing machine needed.
​
Instructions include a technique for the pin backing to give all of your fabric flower brooches a professional finish!
​
Show off your La Todera Berry Bunch Brooch on your lapel, sweater, jean jacket, purse, lab coat, sunhat, headband, apron, wedding dress, bike basket, - you name it!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Kafflower! Brooch Pattern
description:
Add some 'Kapow!' to your look with one of these luscious fabric flower pins called Kafflowers!
​
This step by step La Todera pattern with photos makes it so easy to make a whole garden of these fabric flower brooches for yourself and for gifts!

 ​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Kabloom! Pincushion Pattern
description:
Show off your Kabloom Pincushion on your sewing table, hang it on the wall to corral your brooches, or give it as a gift!
​
Great take-along project- no sewing machine needed.
 
Instructions include suggestions for varying the look of the Kabloom! Pincushion with beads and ribbon.


Back to Shop
 ​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Cymbidium Orchid Brooch Pattern
description:
Can you see a bunch of these Cymbidium fabric orchids made up into a beautiful everlasting wedding bouquet and accessories?  How about adorning an art quilt- or your jean jacket?
​
Simple La Todera pattern with instructions for
3 sizes of Cymbidium orchid blooms:
4 1/2", 3 7/8", and 2 3/4". 

Bonus: Instructions for making buds!

Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Mama and Baby Flatty Dogs Pattern
description:
Make a sweet mama and baby set of vintage-inspired Flatty Dogs.  Make a whole family! 

Intricate looking construction made quick and easy with clear photo-enhanced instructions and 'secret ingredient.'  Bonus-instructions for making flower eyes!
​
Both make grabbable, adorable, fabulous gifts, made in a jiffy!
​
The La Todera Mama/Baby Flatty Dogs Pattern is jelly roll and charm square friendly.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Fabric Ornament Bling Balls Pattern
description:
No sewing required-  Bejewel your space!
​
The La Todera Bling balls Fabric Ornaments Pattern includes templates to make five sizes of fabulous fabric orbs. 
​

Show off your Fabric Ornament Bling Balls:  On your holiday tree!  From a chandelier!  On an ornament hanger!  On the ends of curtain rods!  Under a glass bell jar!  In a large bowl all year round!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Pointsettia Brooches Pattern
description:
The iconic poinsettia, done up in silk or quilting cotton! Make them in classic, vibrant red or winter white. Or go retro in Parisian pink!
The La Todera Pointsettia Brooches Pattern includes 3 sizes- large blooms are 6" across, medium are 4" across, and buds are 1 1/2"!!
​
Make holiday fashion accessories! Festive-ize your jackets, purses, headbands, pet collars, etc. Embellish your holiday crafts such as stockings, tree skirts, wreaths, quilt wall hangings and the like!
​
Easy to follow photo instructions make this La Todera Pointsettia Brooches Pattern simple to make. No sewing machine required- makes a faboo take-along project!
​
​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Cream Puff Christmas Trees Pattern
description:
Show off your Cream Puff Christmas Trees: On your holiday tree! On your mantel! Under a glass bell jar, sprinkled with snow glitter! As holiday themed pincushions!
​
No sewing machine required- Quick, easy, and portable project. Make lovely decorations and gifts!
​
Pattern includes templates to make THREE SIZES of fabulous fabric Cream Puff Christmas Trees. (Note: Snow Baby figurines are not included in the pattern.)

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Dinner Plate Dahlia Brooch Pattern
description:
Anyone love seed and flower catalogs like I do? How about the classic photo of a small child holding a 'Dinner Plate' (Ginormous!) Dahlia right next to their sweet little face for scale? Then this flower is for you-
​
The big mama of fabric flower brooches- 6" across!! For those a bit more timid, pattern comes with a 4" size, as well as instructions for making buds.
​
Giant Dahlia brooches look great on everything from a jean jacket to a purse to a wedding dress! How about adorning an art quilt or craft project?
​
Easy to follow photo instructions make this pattern simple to make. No sewing machine required- makes a faboo take-along project!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Kanzashi Flower Badges Pattern
description:
Make a clever Kanzashi style Flower Badge with this uber-versatile, easy to follow pattern!
​
Make one for every occasion. Feature your name, company logo, favorite saying, announcement, cutie pie photo- you name it.

Pattern includes templates and instructions for 2 styles of badges: Round: 5" across, and Oval: 3 1/2" wide and 5 1/2" across.
​
Printable templates and sayings for badges available in the 'extras' tab here at latodera.com.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Cactus Blossom Pincushion Pattern
description:
Cactus Blossom Pincushion by La Todera.

Finished pincushion measures 5" across.

Show off this succulently plump pincushion on your sewing table or give it as a gift! 

Use each of the petals and flower center sections for a specific types of pins and needles.

Embellish to your heart's desire with beads! Mix up the fabrics!

Another great take along project. No sewing machine required!

* this pattern is fat quarter friendly!

Items made from this pattern are for personal use only. Thank you!

name: Double Daffodil Brooch Pattern
description:
Anytime is Springtime when you're wearing a Double Daffodil Brooch!

This versatile pattern shows you how to make 3 sizes of Daffodils: Large: 4 1/2”, Medium: 3 1/2”, and Small: 2 1/2”. The smallest make beautiful Narcissus (Paper Whites.)
​
Double Daffodil Brooches look great on everything from a jean jacket to a purse to a wedding dress! How about adorning an art quilt or craft project? Wear one in your hair!

Easy to follow photo instructions make this pattern simple to make. Sewing machine optional- makes a faboo take-along project!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Full Moon Fabric Medallions
description:
Now you can make you own gorgeous custom hanging decorations for kids’ rooms, parties, and holiday decorations!
​
Full Moon Fabric Medallions are easy to make, durable and store-able from year to year!
​
Showcase those yummy fabrics that seem too gorgeous to cut into itty bitty pieces.  Mix and match fabrics for the perfect La Todera style accent for your decor.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Winky Pumpkin Pincushion
description:
Finished size of pincushions: Large: 3 3/4”, Medium: 2 3/4”, Small: 1 3/4.” 
​
Show off these cheeky pumpkin pincushions on your sewing table, under a cloche for a Halloween display, or give them as a gifts!
​
Embellish to your heart's desire with vintage buttons and beads! Mix up the fabrics! 
​
Another great take along project. No sewing machine required! Awesome project for teens- simple to make.

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Plumeria Potholder Pattern
description:
Finished potholder measures 9" across.

Adorn your kitchen with custom potholders/ trivets! Make quick gifts for your favorite cooks and tea lovers!

These whip up in a jiffy in quilting cottons. We recommend Insul-brite insulating batting for the 'filling' (readily available at your local quilt store and online.)

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!

name: Pixel Rose Quilt Pattern
description:
Modern with a reference to the past- a needlework inspired close-up rose pattern showcases the unique textures of La Todera’s new line of fabrics: “A Closer Look” for Clothworks!
This quilt uses Bosal Fusible 1” Grid, making quick work of this project. This grid is especially light and flexible- the finished quilt not only has perfectly matching seams, but is light and drapes beautifully!
Finished size of 68 ½” z 68 ½” makes for a stunning large wallhanging or comfy sofa quilt.

name: Faire Isle Flower Quilt Pattern
description:
Modern with a reference to the past- a needlework inspired close-up Faire Isle pattern showcases the unique purl ‘textures’ of La Todera’s new line of fabrics: “A Closer Look” for Clothworks!  In fact, this quilt features the entire 5 fabric group the “Purl” group.  A tongue-in-cheek play on the traditional knit items with this pattern!

This quilt uses Bosal’s Craft and Quilt 1” Grid, making quick work of this project.  This grid is especially light and flexible- the finished quilt not only has perfectly matching seams, but is light and drapes beautifully!  

Pattern features 2 sizes- 42 ½” x 47” for a lap quilt or wall hanging,  and twin bed size at 70 ½” x 80”.

name: I Love Lava Lamps Quilt Pattern
description:
Love lava lamps?  Love cool fabric?  Love modern quilts?  Love easy quilt patterns?  This is the pattern for you!
​
We are so excited about the release of La Todera's 'Photochrome Petals' new line of fabric with Clothworks​​!  This quilt was created with these fabrics in mind with their bubble like ombre effect with overlay of tiny, three color 'bubbles.'
﻿
Finished size of quilt: 81" by 105"
﻿
See pattern cover image for fabric requirements.
﻿
Mesmerizing!

​Items made from this pattern are for personal use only.  Thank you!
